# Bio

:::float-image

```{r out.width='200px', out.extra='style="float:right; margin-left:15px; margin-right:15px; clip-path: circle();"', echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AtlasOfLivingAustralia/ala-labs/main/images/people/jenna.jpg")
```

Jenna is a conservation scientist with a PhD in Plant Ecology. She is currently the Training and Outreach Coordinator at the ALA. Her role is to make biodiversity data in the ALA by providing workshops, articles and training resources. Jenna is a strong advocate for diversity and inclusion in STEMM fields.
